items.title: Prosecutor in Diddy and Epstein cases fired by justice department
items.description: It is not clear why Maurene Comey was removed from her job at the elite justice department office in Manhattan.

items.title: Two dead and many injured in Russian strike on Ukrainian shopping centre
items.description: President Zelensky called the strike in Dobropillia "horrific", accusing Russia of "trying to take as many lives as possible".

items.title: Who are the Druze and why is Israel attacking Syria?
items.description: A fresh wave of deadly sectarian violence has rocked Syria, highlighting the country's fragile security landscape.

items.title: Ramaphosa struggles to mend fences with Trump
items.description: President Ramaphosa's special envoy has reportedly been rejected by the US, in the latest sign of frosty relations.

items.title: 'It's just better!' Trump says Coca-Cola to change key US ingredient
items.description: Coca-Cola said they "appreciate President Trump's enthusiasm", without confirming they plan to make the tweak.
